li.a: Message from the Dean of School
Board Minutes, Agendas, Dean's Board Reports
Know Your Rights: Students with Disabilities in Charter Schools

br.span:
Please remember to check your personal emails for a link to set up your parent Founders' email account. If your link expired, please let administration@tfanh.org know.
Your Founders' email address is needed to access and complete Back To School forms. Thank you! See you very soon!
Welcome back to school! Whether you are new to Founders or returning, we know that this year is going to be the best yet. With our new annual mantra of "
", the Founders community cannot wait to move forward to a school year filled with new challenging courses and extracurriculars.

strong.br: And most importantly we are moving forward to prepare even more principled leaders through a classic education and a variety of opportunities to lead as is The Vision of the school.

br.span: As we are preparing to send-off our second graduating class, the class of 2020, we are simultaneously welcoming the class of 2027 to our halls. Best of luck to all students. Founders faculty wishes you a great 2019-2020 school year. -

The Founders Academy is a public chartered school encompassing grades 6 - 12 that is free and open to all New Hampshire students. The Academy develops leaders who understand and apply the lessons of the past, demonstrate exceptional character and lead by example. The Academy recognizes the importance of balance in the development of the whole person, and respects each student's journey.
To read the full mission statement, click here.
